Text: Kwa, uwe̩ oli fe̩r, todu sida le̩ lewane̩,
Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma kpa le̩ je̩.
Owñ chʼe-kʼabo ki la ma akpa ma ku ma ma la gbʼo̩wo̩ abi n; abo ku ma ko ma ta kakini, Jihofa ki nele, todu u mud anana me̩; kʼamadide e-ma onugo ma li ma ejumomi n.

Todu omi ñʼali abo ku ma dodo ane̩-i ejumomi ge̩ n, Jihofa ka-i. Me̩ muda go, nakʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aboke̩le̩-ma nyʼekeji-wñ o̩wo̩, kpai tʼef o̩wo̩ onu-wñ; tak abo le̩ akpʼane̩-i; omi la agba ma bʼuma o̩wo̩ te̩ n.

Abe̩le̩ u kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma kpa le̩ je̩, owñ chʼame̩no̩bata ef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩. Tak u mʼo̩kpa meji ko; u la dʼodu o̩ka-wñ ko̩ Ube̩do̩, u la dʼekeji-wñ ko̩ Ejidama. U la kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩ je̩.
Tak u fʼamadidala me̩ta le̩ ko̩da rinyo̩ ochu ʼka. Todu uhia-ma fʼonugo-mi hia, onugo-ma laño̩ hihie̩ne̩ mi ge̩.
Tak u kakini, Nakʼije̩ ñwu me̩ je̩ n. E-ki aku, ki ku ke; e-ki dukpe̩ ki lenyo̩, ki lenyo̩; oñ abo ki bo̩ du ki naje̩ o̩re̩la omune̩.
Oñ u mʼo̩kpa-mi Ube̩do̩ le̩ du, oñ u mʼu ko da meji, todu kʼu fʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai amone̩ le̩ du bie̩.
Tak i mubie̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ tak ame̩ no̩bata ku ma nyʼumi eti ef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩ ma ka kʼo̩la Jihofa i che.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, i nyo̩ eju-me̩, maku me̩ fʼo̩me̩-mi ra ñwu mi ke; i ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, me̩ we. Oñ ma fʼajifa ogue̩gwa ñwa ki chʼo̩me̩-mi.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, mʼu ko rikpolo jʼane̩ ñw abucha le̩—owñ chʼalaja o̩me̩me̩le̩ ku ma ñwa ki chʼeju-mi. Tak u mʼajifa ogue̩gwa le̩ ko oñ u ko rikpolo jʼane̩ ñw abucha ef unyi Jihofa.
Tak u ño̩ fʼo̩kpa-mi ekeji ko̩da meji, owñ chʼe-Ejidama le̩, kʼu fʼo̩maye agbagba Juda kpai Israe̩l bie̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki ño̩ mʼe̩wñ eku idada ki adide amala ko ge̩.

Todu go, omi adu adidala kwane̩ oj ane̩-i kʼi ma la anyʼafejudo abo ku ma che ku ma lenyo̩ n, i la atejane̩ abo ku ma fiatuka n, i la akpʼagbe abo ki chagbe n, i la akʼije̩ ñw abo ki nʼo̩lafia je̩ n; i muda aje̩ o̩rela abo ki yoyo, i la afʼetikpa-ma fana rinyo̩.
